title: Planted x Subway: Teriyaki Chicken Now Nationwide
excerpt: Our biggest partnership yet. Starting October 2025, planted.chicken Teriyaki is available at every Subway location across Switzerland and Germany.
content: What happens when the world's largest sandwich chain teams up with Switzerland's most innovative plant-based meat company? Something delicious. The new Planted Teriyaki Sandwich features our signature planted.chicken, glazed in authentic teriyaki sauce, with fresh vegetables on freshly baked bread. Available now at all participating Subway restaurants.
author: Planted Team
